text_block_list.text:
Today, Rice Shower and I were at the beach for the first 
day of summer training camp. Wasting no time, we dove 
straight into our training, however ——

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa, phew… How was my time, big brother?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa, phew… How was my time, big sister?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Ahh… we haven't quite reached our goal, right? 
I'm sorry… it's because I'm not good enough…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
… But, you know, I understand where I'm having issues. 
S-So I want to keep trying until I overcome them.
choice_data_list: Good stuff! Keep giving it your all!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! If I keep working on one weakness at a time… 
keep learning new things, then slowly, but surely……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: … Even someone like me can run faster!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm going to go for one more lap, big brother!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm going to go for one more lap, big sister!

Eyes filled with determination, Rice Shower sprinted ahead 
with bold strides that reflected her unwavering resolve. 
While watching over her, I heard a little voice ——

text_block_list.name: Small Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
… Wow, that's so amazing! Even though she's 
been at it for a while, she's still running!

text_block_list.name: Small Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: … Ah! E-Excuse me. Please ignore what I said…!
The small horsegirl frantically dashed away into the distance…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ahhh, I'm beat…!!
choice_data_list: Well done, Rice! We reached our goal!
Well done, Rice! We reached our goal!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah… R-Really?!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Y-Yay… Yaaaaayyy～!!! We did it!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: It took a while… but I'm glad I was able to pull it off in the end!

text_block_list.name: Small Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: … Wow, that's incredible.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hmm…?

As I glanced over to Rice Shower, I noticed the small 
horsegirl from earlier was standing by her side.

text_block_list.name: Small Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
You're Rice, right? You're so amazing… 
I've never seen anyone work so hard before!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Amazing? Huh… me?! 
… N-No way, not at all! Far from it…!

text_block_list.name: Small Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
It's true though! I saw you running this whole time 
without taking any breaks. Completely different from 
me, who easily gives up……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
T-There's been many times when I want to give up, too! 
… Really… lots of times……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
You see, I'm always failing, and I'm not very talented… 
Because I don't like that about myself, I keep thinking, 
"I want to change! I'm done with staying like this!".

text_block_list.name: Small Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Is that so? But… But then, how are you able to work so hard?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Well, that's because ——

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …… Because I found my ideal self that I want to pursue.

text_block_list.name: Small Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Your ideal self…?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that's right. I wanted to become someone who 
could do all sorts of things, like being good at racing, 
making everyone happy. Those kind of things!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Once I made up my mind there was no turning back. To achieve my goal, I needed to push myself further. I wanted to run… I had to run. Harder, and faster…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
A-Ah, umm… I'm sorry. I'm not very good with words…! 
So I might not have answered your question very well!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: H-Huh…… whaaaaa?!
(WOOOOOOSHHH!!)

Out of nowhere, a massive wave came roaring 
down and drenched all of us from head to toe!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Cough, cough…! Aaaaahhhh, I'm so sorry! It's because you're with me this happened…!

text_block_list.name: Small Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Cough, cough! …… Pfffftt, bahahahahaha!!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: H-Huh? What's so funny…?

text_block_list.name: Small Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaha, sorry. Maybe it's because of that big wave hitting it, 
but my head feels all clear and refreshed now!

text_block_list.name: Small Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Thank you, Rice… Thanks to you, I was able 
to remember something very important.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hm… Hmm…?

text_block_list.name: Small Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
I almost forgot the feeling of wanting to become stronger, 
to become faster… If I hold on to those feelings, then that 
means there's no time to be thinking about giving up, right?

text_block_list.name: Small Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
I get it now! I'm gonna go for a quick run～! 
Thanks for the help, Rice! I'll see you in a race next!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
W-Why…? It's because of me that she's all drenched like this… 
So… why is she thanking me…?
choice_data_list: Because you're the one who inspired her.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: H-Huh, me? I… inspired her…? Sob… sob…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Uwaaaahh!!

The weight of all her struggles and emotions came 
crashing down on her at once. I decided to stay with 
her to give her comfort until night time.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry… for suddenly crying on you like that… 
But… I was just so happy.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
That was my first time. To be able to inspire someone 
like that instead of bringing them unhappiness…
choice_data_list: You definitely lit up her world!
You definitely lit up her world!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ……! Mm… If that's the case then I'm really happy about that…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: You see, up until now, I've always hated myself for who I am…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But, maybe… maybe, just a tiny bit, I don't mind myself that much today… Ehehe.

Rice Shower's slightly bashful smile illuminated the night 
sky more than any of its twinkling stars, radiating warmth 
and joy amidst the cool night air.
